intro: Calathea latifolia, commonly known as the Stromanthe, is a tropical plant native to South America. It is characterized by its striking, colorful foliage with intricate patterns and variegation. The leaves are broad and lance-shaped, often displaying shades of green, silver, and pink. It thrives in bright, indirect light and requires consistent moisture and high humidity. Calathea latifolia is well-suited for indoor cultivation due to its adaptability and ornamental value.
